price: او دوى به ويل چې اّيا موږ به د يو لېوني شاعر لپاره د خپلو باطلو معبودانو پرېښودونكي يو؟
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
